summary: HELLO,    MY INSURANCE COMPANY HAS NOTIFIED ME THAT THEY WILL BE REMOVING MY VEHICLE FROM MY POLICY AS IT CANNOT BE REGISTERED IN CANADA DUE TO THIS OUTSTANDING RECALL.  I WAS NOTIFIED OF THIS RECALL ABOUT 1 YEAR AGO AND PARTS ARE STILL NOT AVAILABLE. THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE. HOW LONG ARE PEOPLE SUPPOSED TO WAIT TO HAVE A NECESSARY RECALL FOXED? NOT TO MENTION UNSAFE!  I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO DRIVE MY CAR FOR 8 MONTHS DUE TO THIS RECALL.  THIS IS VERY DISHEARTENING AND UNRELIABLE OF MERCEDES BENZ.  I HAVE CONTACTED HE COMPANY MANY TIMES AND THEY NEVER HAVE AN ANSWER OF WHEN IT IS READY AND KEEP CHANGING THE DATE
